instruction: Please summarize the performance of different factors and sectors in different economic growth scenarios based on the information provided.
output: According to the information provided, minimum volatility and enhanced value factors have outperformed the broad market in stagflation and heating-up scenarios respectively, while momentum and quality factors have outperformed in both scenarios. In terms of sectors, health care has performed well in stagflation environments, while IT has done favorably in heating-up environments. MSCI will continue to analyze performance dynamics in different macro regimes and extend the analysis to other asset classes as the inflation story evolves.
